Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Enacts the individual counseling rate enhancement act
Summary: Requires a rate enhancement for reimbursement of individual psychotherapy services provided by a mental health counselor, a clinical social worker, or a psychologist where such services are provided in an outpatient substance use disorder clinic.
LawCode: Add ยง19.18-d, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing the individual counseling for integrated care rate enhancement act
